name: Darksiders
description: Uses koku-xinput-wine for full joypad support (including force feedback)
content:
files:
- x360ce_dinput8: https://lutris.net/files/tools/x360ce-dinput8.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 50620
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: x360ce_dinput8
- task:
    app: quartz
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: devenum
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: wmp9
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: directx9
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
winesteam:
  overrides:
    dinput8: native,builtin
    xinput1_3: builtin
  xinput: true
